data.product: Custom MONOGRAM Cocktail Ice CYLINDER Tray
data.description:
Unleash your inner mixologist with our custom ice cylinder mold! Thanks to its surface-to-volume ratio, ice cylinders actually dilute your drink less than standard ice cubes. They also look super chic in a round rocks glass. So it turns out circles aren't completely pointless! (You’re welcome, fellow dad joke enthusiasts).

Bemold custom ice molds effortlessly transform any beverage into an extraordinary work of art. Cheers!

FEATURES:
- Makes ice cylinders 2.2 inches in diameter - perfect for a standard rocks glass
- Personalize each ice cube with up to three initials in the classic round monogram style
- Soft silicone remains flexible when frozen, making removing cubes a breeze
- Made-to-order by a small business in Concord, Massachusetts
- Designed to last a lifetime
- Lids are NOT available for this mold type.

MATERIALS:
- Food grade silicone
- Free of BPA, lead, and phthalates
- Dishwasher and oven safe up to 400F

MEASUREMENTS:
- 2 cylinder ice tray: 4.8” length x 2.5” width x 2.3” height
- 4 cylinder ice tray: 6.2” length x 5.6” width x 2.3” height
- 7 cylinder ice tray: 7.4” length x 6.7” width x 2.3” height
- Ice cylinders: 2.2” diameter x 2.0” height

HOW TO ORDER:
Please type the initials from left to right in the EXACT order you want them to appear on ice. For an individual’s monogram, it is traditional to arrange the initials from left to right as first name, last name, middle name. So for Sarah Jessica Parker, you would type SPJ. For a couple’s monogram, it is traditional to arrange the initials from left to right as one person’s first name, the shared last name, and the other person’s first name. So for Victoria and David Beckham, you would order VBD. To see how your initials will appear, please reference the style guide in the product photos.

Please note that the beloved round monogram style requires letters to conform to a circle. As a result, some letters may look unusual depending on their placement. For the full monogram alphabet, please reference this link: https://tinyurl.com/mdxmcm5s

Visit our shop or to find our listings for ice trays that allow you to include plain text or a custom logo / graphic!

TIPS FOR PHOTOGENIC ICE:
1. Use distilled water: Tap water naturally contains impurities which cause white cloudy balls to form in the cubes as they freeze. To minimize cloudiness, we recommend filling your mold with distilled water, which is free from impurities and is readily available at grocery stores for about $1 per gallon.
2. Remove air bubbles: The surface of your ice cubes may have pockmarks created by air bubbles that were stuck inside your design or clinging to the walls of the ice tray when frozen. Prevent this by using a chop stick or butter knife to release any visible air bubbles from the mold before freezing.
3. Temper the ice: Before putting the ice in your drink, place it on a dinner plate for a few minutes to allow it to warm up slighty. This prevents it from cracking as soon as it hits the room temperature liquor.
4. Allow frost to form: As the ice warms up outside of the freezer, moisture in the air will condense on the surface of the ice, creating a nice frost that makes the appearance of your monogram much sharper. That's the secret to our photos!
5. Keep it dry: here's our spin on the old adage - ice before liquor, design fades quicker. Liquor before ice, stays looking nice. In other words, carefully add your tempered, frosty ice cube to your drink last to keep the design dry. If you pour room temperature liquor over your frosty design, it will quickly vanish, and you'll be quite disappointed!

BULK ORDER INQUIRIES:
Send us a message with your quantity and delivery timeframe and we'd be happy to get back to you with pricing!

POLICIES:
- Our refund policy is available upon request.
- Our return/exchange policy can be located at the bottom of every listing.
- Have a question? The best way to contact us is to send us a direct message.

*Due to the nature of our production process and order volume, all delivery dates are subject to change.

There are those who continue to light up

data.description:
This lovely soap gift box includes EIGHT 4.3oz soap bars with optional gift box and add on options. If you are a big fan of handmade soap, this gift box is the perfect gift for your loved ones or pampering yourself!

Our soap bar is handmade with 100% natural ingredients through traditional cold process method to best preserve the nutrients and effectiveness of those gorgeous oils including pure olive oil, organic coconut oil. Enriched with organic shea butter, castor oil to provide creamy and rich lather and leave your skin deeply cleansed and hydrated. Scented with natural essential oil only to make you feel and smell amazing.

🌟Gift Box Option
Plain white mailer (no extra charge)
Printed Gift Box (#3.5 extra)

🌟Add on Option
Linen Cotton Soap Saver ($5.95)
Wood Soap Dish ($8)

🌟Personalized Soap Option:
If you would like to choose your own, please leave your chosen soap code in the personalization box.
(If your chosen soap is sold out, we will replace it with a similar one of equal weight). If you would like random, we will pick for you!

🌟4.3 oz Soap Choice include:
A. rose honey
B. honey orange turmeric
C. (mint) coffee
D. lavender
E. charcoal cedar rose
F. cocoa maple oatmeal
G. lavender eucalyptus
H. pink salt rose
I. lavender cedar zen
J. cinnamon walnut oatmeal
K. blue sea salt
L. lemon honey cake
M. citrus cedar marble
O. lemon poppyseed
P. peppermint garden
Q. ocean breeze
S. coconut milk
T. french lavender bergamot
U. lemongrass spearmint
V. snowy pine
W. calming lavender
X. aloe kelp tea tree
Y. pumpkin spice
Z. california ale (beer soap)

INGREDIENTS
Soaps are made with pure olive oil, organic shea butter, organic coconut oil, organic castor oil, colored with natural colorant and scented with essential oils. Please see the listing of individual soap bars for full ingredients list and descriptions.

All Soaps are cold process handmade soap.

ORGANIC & VEGAN BASED ♥ 100% NATURAL ♥ SCENTED WITH ESSENTIAL OIL ONLY
PALM FREE ♥ SYNTHETIC FRAGRANCE FREE ♥ ARTIFICIAL COLORANT FREE

A personalized cutting board is a great way to show off your personality in the kitchen decor. With so many fun and unique designs to choose from, you're sure to find the perfect one for your style. Our personalized cutting boards, available in Walnut, Maple and White Oak can be customized as a housewarming gift or any special occasion. 

A personalized cutting board is ideal for a housewarming or wedding present or to celebrate a special occasion. Options for customizing a wooden cutting board range from simple monograms to handwritten recipes, and they're available in many different materials and sizes. 

You can personalize any of our products by engraving a special message, a date or anything else that would make your product truly unique. 

With a range of applications and options available, our personalized & engraved cutting boards, chopping blocks and cheese boards can make a stunning addition to your own kitchen or serve as the perfect present for holidays, Christmas gift, Wedding gift ,Mothers Day, Anniversary and other occasions. 

A custom engraved cutting board make the perfect corporate promotional gift, decorative company display, or for friends and family as a wedding gift, anniversary gift, engagement present, birthday gift, housewarming gift or any other occasion! 

The engraved side is for display purposes while the other side is for chopping board. The cutting boards are flawlessly finished and all surfaces sanded to reveal the beautiful wood grain. You have the option of adding an easel to display this beautiful board and save counter space, or add our board butter to maintain the beauty of the wood.

data.description:
Rustic farmhouse-style walnut charcuterie boards - These beautiful cheese boards can be used to serve charcuterie, appetizers, cheese, or even be used as wall art and home décor. Your personalization is engraved with our high-power laser using an elegant script handwritten font, this charcuterie board makes for a beautiful wedding gift, anniversary gift, housewarming, Christmas, or just because! 

DIMENSIONS (including handle) 
Small: 12.5" long x 8" wide 
Medium: 15.5" long x 8" wide 
Large: 20" long x 8" wide 

WHO WE ARE 
Windset Studio is a family-owned business located in Reno, Nevada. We live our lives with the philosophy that the environment we create is really an extension of who we are. Everything we put into our boards exemplifies this philosophy - from the attention to detail, materials, and the personalization that makes each piece truly unique. 

UNIQUENESS 
These walnut boards are made with very high standards and each have their own unique grain figuring and coloration. Therefore, each board is a little different (i.e. wood will have different grains, patterns, etc). 

CARE 
-Highly Recommended!- Keep your board looking incredible with our board-care kit! The kit contains our handmade conditioner made from a perfect blend of mineral oil & beeswax, a lint-free microfiber cloth, and care instructions to maintain your beautiful board for years to come! See our Etsy store to purchase the care kit with your board. 
• Avoid scrubbing the board vigorously during cleaning, as it may lead to fading of the finish. 
• Never soak the board or place it in the dishwasher. 
• Prevent deep-pigmented foods from coming into direct contact with the board to prevent potential staining. 
• As with any porous material, food usage is at your own risk. 

DISCLAIMER: 
Please double check the spelling and date before ordering. We understand it is easy to make a mistake when ordering, and we want to make sure you get the board as intended. We will copy and paste all information into our designs. We are not responsible for errors caused by misspellings or mistyped information in the personalization box. If you find there is an error after ordering, MESSAGE US IMMEDIATELY and we will work to resolve the issue before your board is made. Once the board is made, we cannot make any changes.

data.product: Personalized Custom Rustic Wooden Chopping Cutting Cheeseboard
data.description:
A beautifully designed, unique and custom engraved personalized gift. Crafted from rustic olive wood and ideal to use as chopping, serving, charcuterie or antipasti board, made from sustainable, natural olive wood. 

The bottom edge has been left organic with hints of bark and rough natural edges for that rustic look and feel.

We only use wood from very old olive trees that have come to the end of their natural fruiting life and have already been replaced with younger, more productive trees.

By now choosing to not brand our gift boxes, we're encouraging recipients to engage in sustainable practices by reusing, repurposing, or regifting them. This approach reduces waste and promotes a more eco-friendly way of celebrating occasions.

Hand finished with an odorless and flavourless, organic hemp oil.

Personalize it with your own text or design to make it a truly unique and special gift.

Sizes

7.9" x 5.5" x 0.8" (20cm x 14cm x 2cm) - Perfectly handy for chopping herbs, chilies, garlic, ginger, cheese, etc.

11.8" x 5.9" x 0.8" (30cm x 15cm x 2cm)  - Great for serving cheese, chopping veg, and as above.

15.7" x 6.5" x 0.8" (40cm x 17cm x 2cm) - As above again....but looks great as a serving and presentation board on the dining table.

19.7" x 7.9" x 0.8" (50cm x 20cm x 2cm) - As above, but large enough to serve as a Charcuterie board!

data.description: This pendant ceramic lamp is a unique and contemporary artwork creation, handmade in the innovative studio of designer-maker Noa Razer in Tel Aviv, Israel. Part of the Apilar collection, it is inspired by differentiated and unique Spanish ceramics, featuring nine different shapes that can be stacked one on top of the other to form countless creation options with spectacular colors. The ceramic prints on top are inspired by traditions from different cultures, creating a contemporary cultural collage. The designer's ongoing research focuses on traditional ceramics as a cultural carrier, searching for a sense of belonging through the local material culture.

uniqueAttributes.Handmade: This piece was created in the innovative studio of the designer-maker Noa Razer, which is located in Tel Aviv, Israel.
uniqueAttributes.Unique design: The Apilar collection ('stack' in Spanish) began to take shape during a family roots trip to southern Spain, influenced by the differentiated and unique Spanish ceramics. In this collection, there are nine different shapes, from which all structures of the collection are built. Countless creation options are formed by stacking the shapes one on top of the other into new complex compositions with spectacular colors.
uniqueAttributes.Cultural inspiration: On top of the pieces are ceramic prints, inspired by traditions from different cultures, creating a contemporary cultural collage.

data.description: This handmade pendant ceramic lamp showcases a contemporary artwork creation, combining bare terracotta and glossy ceramic in shades of green with a touch of orange-red. It is 7.9 inches in height and diameter, and comes with a 60-inch golden textile cable and a terracotta ceiling rose. The lamp is suitable for standard E27 bulbs and is recommended for use with energy-saving LED bulbs. Please note that the bulb is not included. This product is made to order and may vary slightly from the one pictured. It can be ordered in various colors and prints, and is part of the Apilar collection, inspired by Spanish ceramics.
